title: Auto-switch details pane on task selection
description: Moving selector up/down (j/k) in the task list should automatically update the details pane to show that task's output/details. Remove the Enter keystroke requirement. This matches how ../ticks works - selection change immediately updates the detail view.
closed_reason: Added updateSelectedTaskView() helper method that updates the details pane when selection changes. Modified j/k/g/G/pgup/pgdown handlers to call this method when selectedTask changes. For the current (in-progress) task, shows live output; for closed tasks, shows RunRecord detail view; otherwise shows historical output. Updated footer to show 'esc:live' hint when viewing historical data instead of Enter hint.
